prompts: Create a dark-type bird Pokemon with a mischievous look and vibrant tail feathers.
I want a Pokemon that embodies stealth and cunning, featuring shades of black and green.
Generate a small, winged Pokemon that has a playful personality and a striking yellow beak.
Make a ghostly bird Pokemon with a blend of dark colors and a distinctive feathered tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, featuring dark plumage and sharp eyes.
Design a mischievous Pokemon that looks like a crow, with striking colors and a unique silhouette.
